name: One Week At Birchwood University
description:
A game about being trans, gay, and happy.

Ashley is a recent college graduate driving to visit her brother during his spring break. When she arrives, she's met with a house full of people, and a slightly drunk brother. There she meets three girls who quickly take a liking to her, and invite her to join in on their spring break plans. Choose who to spend your time with and get to know your new friends!

I once said as a joke that I'd make a game where every character is trans. Then I did it. Representation matters.

The music was made using samples and loops found in the Music Maker library.

Character art by kfrancesart.tumblr.com

Content warning: Alcohol

Hangin' Theme: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/one-week-hangin

Chillin' Theme: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/one-week-chillin

Endin' Theme: https://soundcloud.com/raining-sideways/one-week-endin
